name: v2.0356
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0356 ( Alternate character set handling scheme)

allowed_values.display: The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2 and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name".
This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.
This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .
